titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C20

sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2023-08-10 04:48:40.580195 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2023-08-13T15:56:26.205192-04:00.

text.body:
<div type="collation" xml:id="C20">
<seg sID="C20_app1-fMS"/> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C20"/><lb n="c57-0031__main__1"/> <seg eID="C20_app1-fMS"/> <milestone spanTo="#ci57-0031.11" unit="tei:head"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4824"/> <seg sID="C20_app3-fMS"/> another Chapter <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4824"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0031.11"/><lb n="c57-0031__main__2"/>Sometime <seg eID="C20_app3-fMS"/> elapsed before I <seg sID="C20_app5-fMS"/> <del next="#c57-0031.02" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4832">became informed</del> <lb n="c57-0031__main__3"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0031.03"/><lb n="c57-0031__left_margin__1"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__left_margin__d4e4843"> of th </del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0031.01"/><mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4849"/> <mdel>of</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4853"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4853"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4859"/>learned <seg eID="C20_app5-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4859"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4849"/>the history of my friends. It was one <seg sID="C20_app7-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4864">that</del> <lb n="c57-0031__main__4"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0031.05"/><lb n="c57-0031__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0031__left_margin__d4e4875"/> which <sga-add eID="c57-0031__left_margin__d4e4875"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0031.04"/>could not fail to impress itself deeply <seg eID="C20_app7-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app8-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4881"/> <mdel>in</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4885"/>on <seg eID="C20_app8-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4885"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4881"/>my <seg sID="C20_app10-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__5"/>mind <seg eID="C20_app10-fMS"/> unfolding as it did a number of <seg sID="C20_app12-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__6"/>circumstances <seg eID="C20_app12-fMS"/> each <seg sID="C20_app14-fMS"/> inter <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4894">r</del> esting &<w ana="start"/>wonder<lb n="c57-0031__main__7"/>ful<w ana="end"/> <seg eID="C20_app14-fMS"/> to one so utterly inexperienced as I <lb n="c57-0031__main__8"/>was. <seg sID="C20_app16-fMS"/> <del rend="vertical_line" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4906"> <unclear>2</unclear> </del> <seg eID="C20_app16-fMS"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C20_app18-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__9"/>The <seg eID="C20_app18-fMS"/> name of the old man was De Lacey. <lb n="c57-0031__main__10"/>He was <seg sID="C20_app20-fMS"/> decended <seg eID="C20_app20-fMS"/> from a good family in <seg sID="C20_app22-fMS"/> France <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0031.06"/>&<lb n="c57-0031__main__11"/> untill very lately had lived <delSpan anchor="c57-0031.06"/> where for many years <lb n="c57-0031__main__12"/>he had lived <seg eID="C20_app22-fMS"/> in <seg sID="C20_app24-fMS"/> affluence <seg eID="C20_app24-fMS"/> respected by his <seg sID="C20_app26-fMS"/> superiors <seg eID="C20_app26-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__13"/>& beloved by his equals. <seg sID="C20_app28-fMS"/> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0031.07"/>His two children Felix &<w ana="start"/>Aga<lb n="c57-0031__main__14"/>tha<w ana="end"/><delSpan anchor="c57-0031.07"/> His son was bred <seg eID="C20_app28-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app29-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4939"/> <mdel>t</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4943"/>i<sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4943"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4939"/>n the service of his <seg eID="C20_app29-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app30-fMS"/> country <seg eID="C20_app30-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__15"/>& Agatha had <seg sID="C20_app32-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4949"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4951">been</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4954"/>ranked <seg eID="C20_app32-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app33-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4954"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4957">woed</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4960">by gentlemen</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4963"/>with ladies <seg eID="C20_app33-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4963"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4949"/>of the <lb n="c57-0031__main__16"/>highest distinction. A few months <seg sID="C20_app35-fMS"/> <del next="#c57-0031.09" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4970">previous</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4973"/>before <seg eID="C20_app35-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app36-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4973"/><lb n="c57-0031__main__17"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4978">to</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0031.08"/> my <seg eID="C20_app36-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app37-fMS"/> arrival <seg eID="C20_app37-fMS"/> they had lived in a large & <w ana="start"/>lux<lb n="c57-0031__main__18"/>urious<w ana="end"/> <seg sID="C20_app39-fMS"/> city <seg eID="C20_app39-fMS"/> called Paris, surrounded by <seg sID="C20_app41-fMS"/> friends <seg eID="C20_app41-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__19"/>& possessed of every enjoyment <seg sID="C20_app43-fMS"/> that <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4992"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4994">that</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4997"/>which <seg eID="C20_app43-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app44-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4997"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4992"/> virtue <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5001"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5003"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5003"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" next="#c57-0031.10" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5009"/>& <seg eID="C20_app44-fMS"/> refinement of <seg sID="C20_app46-fMS"/> intellect & <seg eID="C20_app46-fMS"/> taste, <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5009"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5001"/><w ana="start"/>ac<lb n="c57-0031__main__20"/>companied<w ana="end"/> <seg sID="C20_app48-fMS"/> with <seg eID="C20_app48-fMS"/> a <seg sID="C20_app50-fMS"/> competent fortune <seg eID="C20_app50-fMS"/> could <lb n="c57-0031__main__21"/>afford. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C20_app52-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__22"/>The <seg eID="C20_app52-fMS"/> father of Safie <seg sID="C20_app54-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5027"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5029">was</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5032"/>had been <seg eID="C20_app54-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5032"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5027"/>the cause of their <seg sID="C20_app56-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__23"/><mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5038"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5040">fall</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5043"/>ruin; <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5043"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5038"/> <seg eID="C20_app56-fMS"/> He was a <seg sID="C20_app58-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5047"/> <mdel>t</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5051"/>T<sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5051"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5047"/>urkish <seg eID="C20_app58-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app59-fMS"/> Merchant <seg eID="C20_app59-fMS"/> and had <seg sID="C20_app61-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__24"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5057">li</del> inhabited Paris for many <seg eID="C20_app61-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app62-fMS"/> years. When his person <lb n="c57-0031__main__25"/>became <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5063"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5065">for some</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5068"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg eID="C20_app62-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5068"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5074"/>for some reason which I could not <seg sID="C20_app64-fMS"/> learn <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5074"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5063"/> <seg eID="C20_app64-fMS"/> obnoxious to the <seg sID="C20_app66-fMS"/> <w ana="start"/>govern<lb n="c57-0031__main__26"/>ment<w ana="end"/>– <seg eID="C20_app66-fMS"/> He was seized and cast into prison <lb n="c57-0031__main__27"/>the very day that Safie arrived from <w ana="start"/>Constan<lb n="c57-0031__main__28"/>tinople<w ana="end"/> to join him. He was <seg sID="C20_app68-fMS"/> tried <seg eID="C20_app68-fMS"/> & condemned <lb n="c57-0031__main__29"/>to death. The injustice of his sentence was very <seg sID="C20_app70-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__30"/>flagrant <seg eID="C20_app70-fMS"/> All Paris <seg sID="C20_app72-fMS"/> were indignant <seg eID="C20_app72-fMS"/> & it <lb n="c57-0031__main__31"/>was judged that his <seg sID="C20_app74-fMS"/> relig <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5100">i</del> ion <seg eID="C20_app74-fMS"/> and <seg sID="C20_app76-fMS"/> wealth <lb n="c57-0031__main__32"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5105">had been the causes of his condemnation rather</del> <lb n="c57-0032__main__1"/><mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5118"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0032.01"/><lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__1"/> <del rend="smear" xml:id="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5126">than</del> <seg eID="C20_app76-fMS"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5129"/>rather <sga-add eID="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5129"/><sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5133"/>than <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5133"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5118"/>the crime <seg sID="C20_app79-fMS"/> alledged <seg eID="C20_app79-fMS"/> against <seg sID="C20_app81-fMS"/> him<lb n="c57-0032__main__2"/> <anchor xml:id="c57-0032.02"/> <zone corresp="#c57-0032.02" type="left_margin" sID="c57-0032__left_margin"/> <addSpan hand="#pbs" spanTo="#c57-0032.03"/> <lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__1"/>had been the <lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__2"/>cause of his <lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__3"/>condemnation<anchor xml:id="c57-0032.03"/> <zone eID="c57-0032__left_margin"/>Felix was present at his trial; <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5155">&</del> <seg eID="C20_app81-fMS"/> his <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5158"/>horror &<sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5158"/> <seg sID="C20_app83-fMS"/> in<lb n="c57-0032__main__3"/>dignation <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5163"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5165"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5165"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5171"/>w<mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5173"/> <mdel>as</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5177"/>ere <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5177"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5173"/><sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5171"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5163"/> uncontrolable <seg eID="C20_app83-fMS"/> when he heard the <seg sID="C20_app85-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0032__main__4"/><mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5185"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5187">event.</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5190"/> <mdel>of</mdel> decision of the court. <seg eID="C20_app85-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5190"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5185"/>He <seg sID="C20_app87-fMS"/> made <seg eID="C20_app87-fMS"/> at that <seg sID="C20_app89-fMS"/> moment <seg eID="C20_app89-fMS"/> a solemn <lb n="c57-0032__main__5"/>vow to deliver <seg sID="C20_app91-fMS"/> him <seg eID="C20_app91-fMS"/> & then looked around <lb n="c57-0032__main__6"/>for the means. After many fruitless <lb n="c57-0032__main__7"/>attempts to gain admittance to the <seg sID="C20_app93-fMS"/> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0032.04"/><w ana="start"/>pri<lb n="c57-0032__main__8"/>son<w ana="end"/><delSpan anchor="c57-0032.04"/><mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5214"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5216">goal</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5219"/>prison <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5219"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5214"/> <seg eID="C20_app93-fMS"/> he found a <seg sID="C20_app95-fMS"/> st <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5223"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5225"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5225"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5231"/>r <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5231"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5223"/> ongly <seg eID="C20_app95-fMS"/> grated window <lb n="c57-0032__main__9"/>in an unguarded part of the <seg sID="C20_app97-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5237"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5239">prison</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5242"/>building, <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5242"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5237"/><lb n="c57-0032__main__10"/>which <seg eID="C20_app97-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app98-fMS"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5249">li</del> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5252">illuminated</del> lighted the dungeon <lb n="c57-0032__main__11"/>of the unfortunate <seg eID="C20_app98-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app99-fMS"/> Mahometan, who <seg eID="C20_app99-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0032__main__12"/>loaded with <seg sID="C20_app101-fMS"/> chains <seg eID="C20_app101-fMS"/> waited in despair <lb n="c57-0032__main__13"/>the execution of the barbarous <seg sID="C20_app103-fMS"/> <w ana="start"/>sen<lb n="c57-0032__main__14"/>tence<w ana="end"/>. <seg eID="C20_app103-fMS"/> Felix visited the grate at <seg sID="C20_app105-fMS"/> night <lb n="c57-0032__main__15"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5270">h</del> <seg eID="C20_app105-fMS"/> and made know<sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5273"/>n <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5273"/>to the prisoner his <lb n="c57-0032__main__16"/>intentions in his favour. The <seg sID="C20_app108-fMS"/> Turk <seg eID="C20_app108-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0032__main__17"/>amazed and <seg sID="C20_app110-fMS"/> delighted <seg eID="C20_app110-fMS"/> endeavoured to <seg sID="C20_app112-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5281"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5283">warm</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0032.05"/><lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5292"/>kindle <sga-add eID="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5292"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5281"/><lb n="c57-0032__main__18"/>the zeal of his <seg eID="C20_app112-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app113-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5299">promised</del> deliverer by <lb n="c57-0032__main__19"/>promises of reward & wealth. Felix rejected <lb n="c57-0032__main__20"/>his offers with <seg eID="C20_app113-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app114-fMS"/> contempt <seg eID="C20_app114-fMS"/> Yet when he <lb n="c57-0032__main__21"/>saw the lovely <seg sID="C20_app116-fMS"/> Safie <seg eID="C20_app116-fMS"/> who was allowed <lb n="c57-0032__main__22"/>to visit her <seg sID="C20_app118-fMS"/> father <seg eID="C20_app118-fMS"/> & <seg sID="C20_app120-fMS"/> who <seg eID="C20_app120-fMS"/> by her <seg sID="C20_app122-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5311">expressive</del> <lb n="c57-0032__main__23"/>gestures <seg eID="C20_app122-fMS"/> expressed her lively gratitude, the <lb n="c57-0032__main__24"/>youth could not help owning to his own <seg sID="C20_app124-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0032__main__25"/>mind <seg eID="C20_app124-fMS"/> that the captive possessed a <lb n="c57-0032__main__26"/>treasure which <seg sID="C20_app126-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5323"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5325"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5325"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5331"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5333"/>altho it had not en <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5333"/> </del> <mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5323"/> would fully reward his <lb n="c57-0032__main__27"/>toil & hazard. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg eID="C20_app126-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app127-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0032__main__28"/>The <seg eID="C20_app127-fMS"/> Turk quickly perceived the <w ana="start"/>im<lb n="c57-0032__main__29"/>pression<w ana="end"/> that his daughter had made on<lb n="c57-0033__main__1"/> <seg sID="C20_app129-fMS"/> heart of Felix <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5361">and resolved to obtain</del> <delSpan spanTo="#c57-0033.01"/>his <lb n="c57-0033__main__2"/> at any price the full zeal <delSpan anchor="c57-0033.01"/> <seg eID="C20_app129-fMS"/> and <seg sID="C20_app131-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5371"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5373">re <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5375"/> <mdel/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5382"/>s <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5382"/> <mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5375"/> olved</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0033.02"/><lb n="c57-0033__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0033__left_margin__d4e5393"/>endeavored <seg eID="C20_app131-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0033__left_margin__d4e5393"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5371"/><lb n="c57-0033__main__3"/>to secure <seg sID="C20_app133-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5399">the</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5402">interrest</del> him <seg eID="C20_app133-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app134-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5405"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5407">at any pr</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5410"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5410"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5416"/>more entirely<sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5416"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5405"/> <seg eID="C20_app134-fMS"/> by <lb n="c57-0033__main__4"/>the promise of her hand in <seg sID="C20_app137-fMS"/> marriage; <seg eID="C20_app137-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0033__main__5"/>Felix was too delicate to accept <seg sID="C20_app139-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5425"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5427"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5429"/>offer <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5429"/> </del> <restore type="smear_strikethrough"> </restore> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5439"/>offer <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5439"/> <mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5425"/> yet <lb n="c57-0033__main__6"/>he looked forward to the probability of <lb n="c57-0033__main__7"/>that event as the consummation of <lb n="c57-0033__main__8"/>his happiness. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/><milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0033__main__9"/>The Turk informed Safie of his <lb n="c57-0033__main__10"/>intentions and <lb n="c57-0033__main__11"/><metamark function="separate">_________________________</metamark><lb n="c57-0033__main__12"/> and rank <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5463"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5465">her father</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5468"/>the merchant <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5468"/> <mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5463"/> commander <lb n="c57-0033__main__13"/><mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5475"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5477">her</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5480"/>his daughter<sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5480"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5475"/> <seg eID="C20_app139-fMS"/> to think no more of<mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5484"/> <seg sID="C20_app174-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5486">him</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5489"/>her <seg eID="C20_app174-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app175-fMS"/> lover<sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5489"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5484"/> but to <lb n="c57-0033__main__14"/>repare to return to her native country <lb n="c57-0033__main__15"/>with him.– <seg eID="C20_app175-fMS"/> The generous nature of Safie <lb n="c57-0033__main__16"/>was outraged by this <seg sID="C20_app177-fMS"/> command –She <seg eID="C20_app177-fMS"/> <w ana="start"/>attempt<lb n="c57-0033__main__17"/>ed<w ana="end"/> to expostulate with her <seg sID="C20_app179-fMS"/> father <seg eID="C20_app179-fMS"/> but <lb n="c57-0033__main__18"/>he left <seg sID="C20_app181-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5508">er</del> her <seg eID="C20_app181-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app182-fMS"/> angrily <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5511">re</del> <seg eID="C20_app182-fMS"/> reiterating his <lb n="c57-0033__main__19"/>tyrannical <seg sID="C20_app184-fMS"/> <shi rend="underline">command.</shi> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5520">orders.</del> <seg eID="C20_app184-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app185-fMS"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg eID="C20_app185-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app186-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0033__main__20"/>A <seg eID="C20_app186-fMS"/> few days <seg sID="C20_app188-fMS"/> after <seg eID="C20_app188-fMS"/> the Turk entered <lb n="c57-0033__main__21"/>his <seg sID="C20_app190-fMS"/> daughters appartment <seg eID="C20_app190-fMS"/> and told her <seg sID="C20_app192-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0033__main__22"/>hastily <seg eID="C20_app192-fMS"/> that he had reason to believe <lb n="c57-0033__main__23"/>that his residence <seg sID="C20_app194-fMS"/> in <seg eID="C20_app194-fMS"/> Leghorn had been <seg sID="C20_app196-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0033__main__24"/>divulged <seg eID="C20_app196-fMS"/> and that he <seg sID="C20_app198-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5536"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5538">would</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5541"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5543">was</del> should <seg eID="C20_app198-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app199-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5541"/> <mdel>b</mdel> <mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5536"/> speedily <lb n="c57-0033__main__25"/>be delivered <seg eID="C20_app199-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app200-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5552"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5554"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5554"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5560"/>up <seg eID="C20_app200-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5560"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5552"/>to the French <seg sID="C20_app202-fMS"/> Government– <lb n="c57-0033__main__26"/><delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0033.04"/>He had just heard of a small vessel <lb n="c57-0033__main__27"/>bound for Constantinople which <delSpan anchor="c57-0033.04"/>He had <lb n="c57-0033__main__28"/>consequently hired a vessel to convey him <zone eID="c57-0033__main"/><surface eID="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0033"/><surface lrx="5368" lry="7104" partOf="ox-frankenstein_notebook_b.xml#ox-frankenstein_volume_ii" ulx="0" uly="0" folio="17v" shelfmark="MS. Abinger c. 57" base="ox-ms_abinger_c57/ox-ms_abinger_c57-0034.xml" id="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0034" sID="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0034"/><graphic url="http://shelleygodwinarchive.org/images/ox/ms_abinger_c57/ms_abinger_c57-0034.jp2"/><zone type="main" sID="c57-0034__main"/><lb n="c57-0034__main__1"/>to <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5585">Can</del> Constantinople <mod sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5588"/> <mdel>in</mdel> <seg eID="C20_app202-fMS"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5592"/>for <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5592"/><mod eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5588"/>which <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5596"/>city <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5596"/>he should <lb n="c57-0034__main__2"/>sail in few hours. He intended to leave his <lb n="c57-0034__main__3"/>daughter <seg sID="C20_app208-fMS"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5604">to foll</del> under the care of a <seg eID="C20_app208-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app209-fMS"/> servant <seg eID="C20_app209-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__4"/>to follow at her leisure with the greater part <lb n="c57-0034__main__5"/>of his <seg sID="C20_app211-fMS"/> property <seg eID="C20_app211-fMS"/> which had not yet arrived <lb n="c57-0034__main__6"/>at Leghorn. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C20_app213-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__7"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5618">Lef</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5621">Deserted by her father</del> <seg eID="C20_app213-fMS"/> Safie <seg sID="C20_app215-fMS"/> revolved <seg eID="C20_app215-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__8"/>in her own mind the <seg sID="C20_app217-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5626">various</del> plan <seg eID="C20_app217-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app218-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5629">s</del> of <w ana="start"/>con<lb n="c57-0034__main__9"/>duct<w ana="end"/> that it would become her to pursue <lb n="c57-0034__main__10"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5641"/>in this emergency. <seg eID="C20_app218-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app219-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5641"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5644">The slavery</del> A residence in Turkey was <w ana="start"/>ab<lb n="c57-0034__main__11"/>horrent<w ana="end"/> to <seg eID="C20_app219-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app220-fMS"/> her – <seg eID="C20_app220-fMS"/> her religion & feelings were <lb n="c57-0034__main__12"/>alike adverse to it. By some papers <seg sID="C20_app224-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5656">that</del> <lb n="c57-0034__main__13"/>of her <seg eID="C20_app224-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app225-fMS"/> fathers that <seg eID="C20_app225-fMS"/> fell into her <seg sID="C20_app227-fMS"/> hands <seg eID="C20_app227-fMS"/> she <lb n="c57-0034__main__14"/>heard of the exile of her <seg sID="C20_app229-fMS"/> lover <seg eID="C20_app229-fMS"/> and <seg sID="C20_app231-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5664">the</del> <lb n="c57-0034__main__15"/>learnt the name of the spot where <lb n="c57-0034__main__16"/>he <seg eID="C20_app231-fMS"/> resided. She hesitated some <seg sID="C20_app233-fMS"/> time <seg eID="C20_app233-fMS"/> but at <lb n="c57-0034__main__17"/>length she formed her <seg sID="C20_app235-fMS"/> resolution —Taking <seg eID="C20_app235-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__18"/>with her some jewels that belonged to her, <lb n="c57-0034__main__19"/>and a <seg sID="C20_app237-fMS"/> small <seg eID="C20_app237-fMS"/> sum of <seg sID="C20_app239-fMS"/> money; <seg eID="C20_app239-fMS"/> she quitted <seg sID="C20_app241-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__20"/>Italy <seg eID="C20_app241-fMS"/> with <seg sID="C20_app243-fMS"/> a <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5680"/>n <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5680"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5683">servant who</del> attendant <seg eID="C20_app243-fMS"/> a <lb n="c57-0034__main__21"/>native of <seg sID="C20_app245-fMS"/> Leghorn <seg eID="C20_app245-fMS"/> but who understood <seg sID="C20_app247-fMS"/> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0034.02"/>Tur <lb n="c57-0034__main__22"/>kish <delSpan anchor="c57-0034.02"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5695"/>Arabic <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5695"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0034.01"/> <seg eID="C20_app247-fMS"/> and departed for Germany. <seg sID="C20_app249-fMS"/> She arrived <lb n="c57-0034__main__23"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5702">safely</del> <seg eID="C20_app249-fMS"/> in safety at a town about <seg sID="C20_app251-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5706"/> <mdel>50</mdel> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5710"/>20 <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5710"/><mod eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5706"/> <seg eID="C20_app251-fMS"/> leagues <lb n="c57-0034__main__24"/>from the Cottage of De <seg sID="C20_app253-fMS"/> Lacey – <seg eID="C20_app253-fMS"/> her attendant <seg sID="C20_app255-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__25"/>then fell <seg eID="C20_app255-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app256-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5718"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5720"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5720"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5726"/>dangerously <seg eID="C20_app256-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app257-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5726"/><mod eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5718"/> ill <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5730">and she was retarded wh</del> <seg eID="C20_app257-fMS"/> Safie <seg sID="C20_app259-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__26"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5736">watched</del> nursed her with the most devoted <seg eID="C20_app259-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app260-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__27"/>affection <seg eID="C20_app260-fMS"/> but the poor girl <seg sID="C20_app262-fMS"/> died <seg eID="C20_app262-fMS"/> &<mod sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5741"/> <seg sID="C20_app264-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5743">Safie</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5746"/>the Arabian <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5746"/><mod eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5741"/><lb n="c57-0034__main__28"/>was left <seg eID="C20_app264-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C20_app265-fMS"/> alone <seg eID="C20_app265-fMS"/> unacquainted with the <w ana="start"/>lan<lb n="c57-0035__main__1"/>guage<w ana="end"/> of the <seg sID="C20_app267-fMS"/> country <seg eID="C20_app267-fMS"/> and utterly ignorant of <lb n="c57-0035__main__2"/>the customs of the world.– She <seg sID="C20_app269-fMS"/> fell <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0035__main__d4e5769">hover</del> however <lb n="c57-0035__main__3"/>in to <seg eID="C20_app269-fMS"/> good <seg sID="C20_app271-fMS"/> hands– <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0035.01"/>The hostess of the Inn was <w ana="start"/>in<lb n="c57-0035__main__4"/>terrested<w ana="end"/> in her fate <delSpan anchor="c57-0035.01"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0035__main__d4e5785">And</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0035__main__d4e5789">and</del> <seg eID="C20_app271-fMS"/> The Italian <seg sID="C20_app273-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0035__main__5"/><mod sID="c57-0035__main__d4e5794"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0035__main__d4e5796">before her death</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0035__main__d4e5799"/>had <seg eID="C20_app273-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0035__main__d4e5799"/><mod eID="c57-0035__main__d4e5794"/>mentioned the name of the <lb n="c57-0035__main__6"/>spot for which they were <seg sID="C20_app275-fMS"/> bound and <seg eID="C20_app275-fMS"/> after <lb n="c57-0035__main__7"/>her <seg sID="C20_app277-fMS"/> death <seg eID="C20_app277-fMS"/> the woman of the house in which <lb n="c57-0035__main__8"/>they had lived took care that Safie should <lb n="c57-0035__main__9"/>arrive <seg sID="C20_app279-fMS"/> safely at the cottage of her lover.<damage type="tear"/> <zone eID="c57-0035__main"/> <surface eID="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0035"/> <surface lrx="7230" lry="5034" partOf="ox-frankenstein_notebook_b.xml#ox-frankenstein_volume_ii" ulx="0" uly="0" folio="18v" shelfmark="MS.
